data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BnZwDlK7W0kQ7kNvgG7g3hw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBgmJN6CguCPZpwa71EpQMv9qKyn35HcpzlQ7MjGUTBkw&oe=669BA01C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=I6sW0wb55JkQ7kNvgGNbe1Q&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBEdn0aSPppGMNnhFfqW8C1JERy_NF4IbJH_ZFq2JGgWw&oe=669BA9A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8j-ADXfiz5oQ7kNvgF32nRk&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA-fRu6CW94TpaACe0xsDj5M4LCTJ7PfJ0mLsnQdnXhsw&oe=669B9107)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=yXl7uUZfCesQ7kNvgFhKWwn&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC9IMz3BlNwzH4rh_m8vqWJHHCKIyFIkE_Js6pG1w1HAw&oe=669B83E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2wzqnd-Q2OwQ7kNvgFEDovI&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBwkzsRyt2KmqDF9QTL8Mn3_DFVgPzCwcz2pgvgh7v7Hw&oe=669BB058)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0EYpAwgTdFYQ7kNvgGZihTV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCBvKTAvpjRr9LCfIXnSz4kkC3n-jnq9CrzLeY8K3mETA&oe=669BACD9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0PjXw6qrWoIQ7kNvgGQ9Sug&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDFtyXVMuUlEg1HBfRXKCywlplAIeTXmTbq7wDQ_NeFSA&oe=669B92F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GK6dzZI8k90Q7kNvgFdMsNz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAtl1eW773wldJtTRYTMAoUKYKeUL7a3wlZx8_1vJTgng&oe=669B7D6A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=emGhnVejorAQ7kNvgG8HbCU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBTucJZHzB0dLxETiT3fTWEdn2BJcImOAkARzi_M4H7Gw&oe=669B9117)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ObyS1TZfXmsQ7kNvgFbQGOU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCPG0UWSAn36c4LAXDSUfcQCrWpGztqd2bWcpV4MA8B0w&oe=669BAC8C)
